description: This vegan creamy kale is made with a garlicky simmering of curly kale in creamy cashew milk. It makes a perfect addition to a holiday table, or a simple but delicious weeknight side dish.
name: Vegan Creamy Kale, Version 2.0
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup raw cashews, (soaked in water 4-8 hours, rinsed and drained)
1 large bunch curly kale, (stems removed and leaves torn into bite-sized pieces)

recipeInstructions.text: Place cashews and water into blender or small food processor bowl. Blend until very smooth.

Coat the bottom of a large pot with olive oil and place over medium heat. Add garlic and saut√© 1 minute. Add vegetable broth and kale. Cover and allow kale to steam until fully wilted, about 5 minutes, removing lid and flipping every so often.
Remove lid from pot and add cashew milk. Stir a few times to incorporate. Bring to a simmer and lower heat. Allow to simmer, uncovered, until liquid reduces by about half, about 5 minutes.
Stir in lemon juice. Add flour, a little bit at a time, stirring constantly, until mixture thickens.
Season with salt and pepper. Serve.
